butter.long: <objButterLong> There is a cup of butter here.

bread.long: <objBreadLong> There is a fresh loaf of bread sealed in a plastic bag.

eggs.long: <objEggsLong> There is a basket of eggs here.

empty_water_gun.long: <objEmptyGunLong> There is an empty water gun here.

water_gun.long: <objFullGunLong> There is a water gun here. It is full of water!

balloon.long: <objBalloonLong> There is a shiny, colorful balloon floating here.

corn.long: <objCornLong> There is an ear of corn on the ground.

guarded_pail.long: <objGuardedPail> There is an empty pail here.

pail.long: <objPailLong> There is an empty pail here.

pail_with_milk.long: <objPailMilkLong> There is a pail here full of milk.

churn.long: <objChurnLong> There is a large, heavy churn here -- perfect for making butter. If only you had some milk.

empty_bowl.long: <descEmptyBowl> There is an empty bowl on the counter. The recipe says: crack eggs into bowl and whisk until smooth.

bowl_with_eggs.long: <descBowlEggs> The eggs are ready! The recipe says: next, dip the bread in the eggs and cook the bread in a hot pan.

plate_of_toast.long: <descToast> There is plate of delicious French toast here. You need some fresh butter to top it off!

long: <descCoyote> A big, bad, brown coyote hunches over the path leading north. He snarls at you and drools. Let's not go that way, please!
